actionable_tasks.title: Frontend Spotify Authentication Interface Completion
actionable_tasks.description: Finish the implementation of the Spotify OAuth authentication UI, ensuring users can log in and authorize the app for playlist creation and streaming.
implementation_steps: Review current Spotify OAuth UI implementation for missing elements.
Add login button and callback handler for OAuth flow.
Test authentication flow with Spotify sandbox account.
Update UI to show authentication status and error messages.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage
actionable_tasks.description: Increase the number of automated tests for critical backend endpoints, focusing on provider switching and health telemetry.
implementation_steps: Identify endpoints with low test coverage using coverage reports.
Write additional unit and integration tests for provider switching logic.
Add tests for error handling and edge cases in health telemetry.
Run test suite and verify increased coverage.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Quality Maintenance Scripts to CI Workflow
actionable_tasks.description: Integrate lint, security audit, and quality check scripts into the CI pipeline for automated code health validation.
implementation_steps: Update CI workflow YAML to include lint, security:audit, and quality:check steps.
Ensure scripts are present in package.json and run correctly in CI environment.
Test CI pipeline locally and on remote to confirm successful execution.
Document CI workflow changes in project README.

actionable_tasks.title: Backend TypeScript Migration (High-Change Modules)
actionable_tasks.description: Begin gradual migration of backend modules with frequent changes to TypeScript for improved type safety and maintainability.
implementation_steps: Select one high-change backend module (e.g., src/api/routes/providers.js).
Rename file to .ts and add TypeScript configuration.
Add type annotations for function parameters and return values.
Fix type errors and run tests to verify correctness.
